title: Júlio da Silva Carvalho (Rua de)
body: This street, which was originally named João da Mata, became known as Mosteiro Novo when a building intended for a small monastery was constructed there, but it was never used for that purpose. It was also called Rua do Seminário because the diocesan seminary operated in the house intended for the monastery. A few years ago, it was named Rua Julio da Silva Carvalho (See this name). It was renamed Rua do Seminário.

Júlio da Silva Carvalho: Person after whom the street was named.
